translations: 所见即所得（What You See Is What You Get）

sentences.sentence: WYSIWYG editing makes your word processing smoother and more flexible.
sentences.translation: “所见即所得”编辑使你的文字信息处理更加顺畅和灵活。

sentences.sentence: We'd had WYSIWYG editors for a long time.
Why, when I was just a lad, we didn't have fancy WYSIWYG editors.
sentences.translation: 为什么，在我年轻时，我们没有优秀的所见即所得编辑器。
